captions.text:
"Wake Up John" Halo Bracelet, and check the
time with your vintage Game Boy watch.
I'm Jake, and this Episode #8 of Game LÜT.

Do some heavy lifting with this Half-Life
2 Gravity Gun replica, and, if you work up

a sweat, wipe it away with a tissue from these
do it yourself tissue boxes that include Portal

warning signs, Mario question blocks, a Game
Cube, and really anything you can think of
in cube form.
Or you can just buy them pre-made...

Then stab your eyes out with a Final Fantasy
Buster Sword Necklace so you don't have to
look at these terrifying spandex suits...

If you already own one, defend yourself from
ridicule with an Assassin's Creed style War

Axe, and be sure to have your Fire Salt and
other Skyrim potion ingredients handy.

Or, just keep that spandex hidden (forever)
in this DIY Legend Of Zelda Treasure Chest.

For something more surgical there is this
incredible Gutsman Operation Game, and continue

your academia with these dictionary video
game prints by artist Deniz Thetis.

If you're bored, roll your Companion cube
dice to decide if you'll play Mario Chess,

this Tetris version of Connect Four, or get
interactive with Zineth, a fast paced, and
free, game for PC and Mac.

Stay in your element with a Minecraft Periodic
Table t-shirt, and check your Skyrim map skirt
to know where you're going.

Then, gorge yourself on baked goods with these
Ni No Kuni cookie cutters, hide your shame

behind a BioShock Bunny Splicer Mask, work
off those new pounds with the smallest DDR

pad ever, and thank your parents that you
don't look like these Ugly Pokemon...

For something cuter there are these Hello
Kitty Street Fighter characters or Morgan

Freeman...Half-Life 2 character mod for Grand
Theft Auto 4...

Throw on your Mass Effect shoes, 8-bit Evil
Dead shirt, and put some Nintendo Furniture

in your room. Then, decorate the walls with
these awesome video game inspired movie poster
prints by iwilding...

Keep everything in line with Katana Book Ends,
subscribe to Vsauce3 for more Game LÜT and
remember, Hugs are the Best Power up.
I'm Jake and, as always...
"Wait, actually, you know what? You know what?"
And, as always, thanks for...
"Wait, wait, wait..."
And, as always, thanks for watching.
(Beat Boxing)
"What?"
